body_html:
Yes, please submit a PR.

Try to stick to the style as you see it in other parts of the code (for contrib, for instance, stick to the directory structure you see in other contrib directories). For documentation, this is covered specifically in https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/documentation/index.html, but that's not all.

The code review we will do should surface other things.

body:
Yes, please submit a PR. 

Try to stick to the style as you see it in other parts of the code (for contrib, for instance, stick to the directory structure you see in other contrib directories). For documentation, this is covered specifically in https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/documentation/index.html, but that's not all.

The code review we will do should surface other things.
